about_the_game:
Single Map / Single Heroine
This is a prologue version that implements the basic system of the main game, which is currently under construction.
No story part, but casual exploratory action and over 8 Heroine hunts and Costumes each.

System
Casual action with the ability to switch between overlooking + first person view
Switch to First Person View to unlock hidden rooms and gimmicks!
It takes only 1 hour of play time to complete the full game!

Earn points!
Destroy enemies on the small aerial island and earn 3 types of points!
The 3 types of points are needed to use skills and to open costumes.
Open costumes at the stores scattered around the map!

Safe Area
There is one heroine in the safe area and you can hunt her!
You can select a costume from the bathhouse.
You can also use some skills on the heroine to perform special hunts.

Hunt Mode
Hunt mode is seamless.
The type of hunt mode depends on the heroine's position and condition
There are more than 8 types of hunt motions, including sneaking up behind her, attacking her to bring her down, binding her, and other skills.
  • The action part can be played with a gamepad (such as an Xbox controller)

Play Hint
If you get lost at the starting point, try attacking crystals and cracked walls with skills.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

detailed_description:
Single Map / Single Heroine
This is a prologue version that implements the basic system of the main game, which is currently under construction.
No story part, but casual exploratory action and over 8 Heroine hunts and Costumes each.

System
Casual action with the ability to switch between overlooking + first person view
Switch to First Person View to unlock hidden rooms and gimmicks!
It takes only 1 hour of play time to complete the full game!

Earn points!
Destroy enemies on the small aerial island and earn 3 types of points!
The 3 types of points are needed to use skills and to open costumes.
Open costumes at the stores scattered around the map!

The type of hunt mode depends on the heroine's position and condition
There are more than 8 types of hunt motions, including sneaking up behind her, attacking her to bring her down, binding her, and other skills.

name: SakuraSegment 0.3 - Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows:10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows:10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: On a small floating island, you destroy enemies, collect points and skills, and purchase costumes from shops dotted around the map. There is a heroine in the safe area and you can hunt.
